TopicTitle: hey a think you guys will like this stuff!!

Articles.Content:
ever wished you could make your own real rocket?? wish no more (well ok maybe a little) step 1 the fuel R-candy or newspaper step 2 the casing [soon to come] step 3 the nozzle [soon to come] step 4 use you imagination. i have not tried any of these i'm just giving you what i know if you get a chance to do this then please post it here we would all like to see photos and maybe a video. also i don't live in the US I'm in australia so you can't get potassium nitrate stump remover but it is not against the law to own potassium nitrate and for those of you who are like me google how to make potassium nitrate at home. thanks

Edited May 16, 2013 by Silver Eagle
